```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
fx <- sample(10:50, 1)
fy <- sample(10:50, 1)
ans <- signif(atan2(fy, fx) * 180 / pi, 2)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, digits = 1, range = c(0, 90), format = FALSE)
sc$questions <- sprintf("$%.1f^\\circ$", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
Xavier pulls on a box with `r fmt(fx, 1)` N of force at $0^\circ$. Yuri pulls on the the same box with
`r fmt(fy, 1)` N of force, at $90^\circ$. What is the angle of the net force?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```


Solution
========
The angle can be found using the arctangent.
$$\theta = \tan^{-1}(`r fy` / `r fx`) = `r ans`^\circ$$
